.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.agw.scrolledthumbnail

.. _wx.lib.agw.scrolledthumbnail.ThumbnailEvent:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.agw.scrolledthumbnail.ThumbnailEvent**
==========================================================================================================================================

This class is used to send events when a thumbnail is hovered, selected,
double-clicked or when its caption has been changed.



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: ThumbnailEvent(wx.PyCommandEvent)

   This class is used to send events when a thumbnail is hovered, selected,
   double-clicked or when its caption has been changed.

   .. method:: __init__(self, evtType, evtId=-1, thumbs=None, keycode=None)

      Default class constructor.
      
      :param `evtType`: the event type;
      :param `evtId`: the event identifier.
